tool_description: Creates structured templates for various business documents including proposals, reports, and memos with industry-specific formatting and section requirements.

document_type.description: Type of document: proposal, report, memo, business_plan, or executive_brief

page_limit.description: Maximum number of pages for the document (1-100)

error_messages: Invalid document type: Use one of [proposal, report, memo, business_plan, executive_brief]
Page limit out of range: Must be between 1 and 100 pages
Industry not recognized: Provide a valid industry name
usage: Specify document_type and industry to generate an appropriate template structure. Optionally set page_limit for length constraints.

template_structure.description: Ordered list of required sections for the document type
